video.title: Silver Spoon
video.synopsis: When a young man flees the city and enrolls in agricultural school, he struggles to define his life path as his compassion for animals grows.

episodes.synopsis: A young runaway from a privileged life in Sapporo enrolls in an agricultural boarding school, which is home to many animals, and struggles to adjust.
episodes.title: Welcome to Ezonoo

episodes.synopsis: In order to fulfill a school requirement, Hachiken checks out the equestrian club, where his classmate, Mikage, is also a member.
episodes.title: Hachiken Rides a Horse

episodes.synopsis: Hachiken is assigned to raise a drove of piglets. Seeing himself in the runt of the litter, he becomes attached, despite knowing the animal's destiny.
episodes.title: Hachiken Meets Pork Bowl

episodes.synopsis: A brick oven has been found during a campus clean-up session, and Hachiken's classmates task the reluctant boy with a pizza-making project.
episodes.title: Hachiken Bakes Pizza

episodes.synopsis: A rumor circulates among the students that lures them to a certain location, but at the appointed time, they are forbidden to leave the dorm.
episodes.title: Hachiken Runs Off

episodes.synopsis: When Hachiken learns that he must evacuate his dorm over summer break, Mikage invites him to stay with her family, where he plans to work on the farm.
episodes.title: Hachiken Goes to Stay with the Mikages

episodes.synopsis: Hachiken and Mikage take a break from farm work by visiting Tamako's enormous Giga Farm, a place more vast than he had ever imagined.
episodes.title: Hachiken Goes to Giga Farm

episodes.synopsis: Hachiken has gotten good at farm work, but during his brother's visit to the farm, he makes a careless error, the effects of which bring him shame.
episodes.title: Hachiken Makes a Huge Mistake

episodes.synopsis: Hachiken goes to visit Pork Bowl and finds him all fat and grown up into a respectable pig, which reminds Hachiken of Pork Bowl's imminent departure
episodes.title: Hachiken Hesitates over Pork Bow

episodes.synopsis: Upon learning that Pork Bowl will be sent off to the slaughterhouse the following day, Hachiken proposes to buy all his meat.
episodes.title: Hachiken Says Goodbye to Pork Bowl

episodes.synopsis: The bacon Hachiken prepared with Pork Bowl's meat becomes a food fad on campus; Komaba's friends cheer him on as his baseball team aims for the top.
episodes.title: Take Off Running, Hachiken

episodes.synopsis: As Hachiken enters his second semester, he is appointed as the equestrian club's new vice president -- whether he likes it or not.
episodes.title: Hachiken Becomes the Club Vice President

episodes.synopsis: As the semester wears on, Hachiken participates in the usual campus clean-up and, as he did before, makes a surprising discovery.
episodes.title: Hachiken Adopts Vice Prez

episodes.synopsis: Hachiken's crew practices show jumping for the fall competition, but Hatchiken finds he is unable to clear the hurdles, and his horse is of no help.
episodes.title: Hachiken Jumps High

episodes.synopsis: On the day of the Freshman War, Hachiken and his teammates grapple with anxiety over their first real competition; Mikage's childhood friend appears.
episodes.title: Minamikujou Appears

episodes.synopsis: As a festival draws closer, Hachiken is already drowning in prep work when the equestrian club decides to create a giant track for horse sled-racing.
episodes.title: Hachiken Has His Hands Full

episodes.synopsis: The school festival begins, and the equestrian club's horse racing event is a hit with the visitors, but strangely, Hachiken is nowhere to be found.
episodes.title: Mikage Gives It Her All

episodes.synopsis: With Komaba's help, the baseball club gets two wins away from the spring play-offs; Hachiken finally manages to go on a date with Mikage.
episodes.title: Komaba Stands on the Pitcher's Mound

episodes.synopsis: Hachiken learns that Komaba must quit school and get a job to help at home, and cannot accept that his friend is forced to forfeit his ambitions.
episodes.title: Hachiken Howls

episodes.synopsis: When financial hardship falls on Komaba's farm, Hachiken and Mikage pay a visit, but Mikage's family farm is also facing difficulties.
episodes.title: The Last Milk

episodes.synopsis: Mikage tells her family about her dream. Hachiken helps her study for her college entrance exams, but she cannot keep pace with his expectations.
episodes.title: Dream

episodes.synopsis: Hachiken returns to his family home and finally confronts his father. His mother visits him at school and gains a new understanding of her son.
episodes.title: Over and Over Again
